name: Hasta La Win Vista baby!
description:
“Hasta La Win Vista baby!”

After many years of being taunted by the computer genius twins, Okin and Borden Wono. Game hobbyist Plastico Fantastico finally gets revenge by trapping his friends in VR purgatory! Borden must scramble to find a way out of the hidden basements and save his brother. Will Borden make it in time ? Will Okin become food for the underground turtles that lurk under sewers. 

Being “Rick-rolled” countless times by the Keyboard Assassins Okin and Borden. Fantastico plans his revenge against them. “Why can’t you program yet, Fantastico?” Muttered under his breath. “You’ll regret not letting me in your super secret, highly-high technically structured club-house.”

Game is made to make my friends laugh. Nothing serious. Just my first game.
